entry.title: KeePassXC Ubuntu 22.04 with Google Drive sync

link.title: KeePassXC Ubuntu 22.04 with Google Drive sync

entry.summary: So, the first question is what should I choose? rclone or google-drive-ocamlfuse? Well, they both use FUSE file system and if you want to sync Google Drive, google-drive-ocamlfuse is less pain in the ass. Actually, after spending two hours setting up rclone and then configuring a service on startup, I found out KeePassXC can’t load the .kdbx from the mounted point. Seems like it’s required to c...

entry.title: Fixing BSOD while running BigNox and WSL

link.title: Fixing BSOD while running BigNox and WSL

entry.summary: Today I have encountered a problem related to running android emulators and Windows Subsystem Linux which was not mentioned in BigNox BSOD repairing tutorial. I was thrown a BSoD every time I run BigNox. It’s not possible to run WSL and BigNox at the same time, but disabling Virtual Machine Platform feature helps to solve the problem.
